newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares seen extending two-session gains.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares seen extending two-session gains.

text.p: Polish shares were expected to extend the last two sessions' gains, recovering from earlier 4.5-percent losses.
Some analysts said, however, that Friday's mixed continuous trade signalled the bourse might stay flat on Monday.

Analysts said Polifarb Cieszyn and Polifarb Wroclaw might outperform the market, after Friday's news that their merger would go ahead, but said their upside was limited as the news had been in part already discounted by investors.
